code: const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;export const fetchBoards=async()=>{const res=await fetch(`${API_BASE}/boards`);const data=await res.json();return data;};export const createBoard=async boardData=>{const res=await fetch(`${API_BASE}/boards`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(boardData)});return res.json();};
